name: Provident Sunworth City
tagline: A 60-Acre Lifestyle Township on Mysore Road
description: Provident Sunworth City is a premium 60-acre lifestyle township offering spacious 2 & 3 BHK apartments near Kengeri on Mysore Road. The project offers excellent connectivity, top-tier amenities, and a fully developed community environment.

highlights.title: Excellent Connectivity
highlights.description: Located on Mysore Road with quick access to NICE Road and Kengeri Metro Station.

highlights.title: 60-Acre Township
highlights.description: Large-scale development with multiple towers, parks, amenities, and community spaces.

highlights.title: World-Class Amenities
highlights.description: Swimming pool, clubhouse, gym, indoor games, kids' play areas and more.

highlights.title: Ready-to-Move Options
highlights.description: OC-received towers with families already residing.

highlights.title: Green Open Spaces
highlights.description: Township planned with landscaped gardens and greenery.

highlights.title: Proximity to IT Hubs
highlights.description: Close to Global Village Tech Park and ideal for professionals.

faq.question: Is the project ready to move?
faq.answer: Yes, several towers are ready to move with occupancy certificate received.

faq.question: Is home loan assistance available?
faq.answer: Yes, we support all major banks for home loans.

faq.question: What amenities are included?
faq.answer: Swimming pool, clubhouse, gym, kids play area, indoor games, landscaped gardens.

faq.question: Is the project RERA approved?
faq.answer: Yes, all approvals and compliance are in place.
